original_text: King David had chosen Asaph and his relatives to serve the Lord at the Covenant Box. They must do that each day, as the rules said that they should do. King David had chosen Asaph and his relatives to serve the Lord at the Covenant Box. They must do that each day, as the rules said that they should do.
korean_text: 다윗이 아삽과 그의 형제를 여호와의 언약궤 앞에 있게 하며 항상 그 궤 앞에서 섬기게 하되 날마다 그 일대로 하게 하였고

sentences.original_text: King David had chosen Asaph and his relatives
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗 왕은 아삽과 그의 친척들을 선택했었습니다

sentences.original_text: to serve the Lord at the Covenant Box
They must do that each day
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 매일 그 일을 해야만 했습니다

sentences.original_text: as the rules said that they should do
